sentences.en: Ive always thought philately would be an interesting hobby.
sentences.cn: 我总是认为集邮是一项有趣的嗜好.

sentences.en: Philately has no longer been a symbol indicating how many stamps serve as postage.
sentences.cn: 集邮已经远远超出了邮票作为邮资支付的功能.

sentences.en: Philately is my favorite hobby now, but I have rarely previously issued stamps.
sentences.cn: 集邮是我现在最喜欢的爱好, 但我很少以前所发行的邮票的.

sentences.en: Philately, pingpong, roller skating, reading and music.
sentences.cn: 集邮 、 乒乓球 、 轮滑 、 读书和音乐.

sentences.en: She said before'actress philately'is false, not the letter.
sentences.cn: 她之前讲的 ‘ 女星集邮 ’ 是假的, 不可以信.

sentences.en: The world of philately soon got to know the rings.
sentences.cn: 集邮界很快就知道了奥运五环标志.

sentences.en: This cover thus became recognised as the most prized and valuable cover in Brazil philately.
sentences.cn: 此封亦因之而成为巴西集邮界最珍重和最名贵的实寄封.

sentences.en: Value - added tax is levied on the production and allocation of philately commodities.
sentences.cn: 集邮商品的生产、调拨征收增值税.

sentences.en: Value - Added Tax shall levied on sales of philately stamps and first day covers by postal departments.
sentences.cn: 邮政部门销售集邮邮票、首日封,应当征收增值税.

sentences.en: Value-added tax is levied on the production and allocation of philately commodities.
sentences.cn: 集邮商品的生产、调拨征收增值税。

sentences.en: Varied ways and means of philately ii.

trans.tran_en: the activity of collecting stamps for pleasure
